description:
"The Walking Dead" hasn't yet returned from its Season 4 midseason hiatus, but casting has begun for both the upcoming Season 5.《行尸走肉》第四季正在冬歇还未回归，不过第五季的选角试镜已经开始了。

A casting call put out on Acting-Auditions.org says producers on the show are looking for "new series regulars, recurring roles, and guest starring roles." The casting call for new zombies has opened up as well. Production will begin on Season 5 in "early 2014."在Acting-Auditions.org上，剧组发布了试镜需求公告，公告中我们可以看到《行尸走肉》剧组需要“新的常规角色、多次出镜角色和客串角色”的演员。而招募扮演丧尸的龙套演员消息也同步公布。制作方将会在2014年年初开始拍摄。

Though it's unclear exactly in which direction Season 5 will head, there's a good chance it will at least have something to do with comic book series villain Negan. 虽然我们还不知道《行尸走肉》第五季会讲述怎样的故事，不过很可能会出现漫画原著中那个的大反派Negan。

"The Walking Dead" returns to AMC with the second half of Season 4 on Feb. 9 at 9 p.m.《行尸走肉》第四季将会在2月9日回归AMC电视台。

title: 《行尸走肉》第五季招募丧尸扮演

description:
After five seasons, "The Vampire Diaries" is finally adding its first gay character ... something in which its spinoff series "The Originals" didn't waste any time in introducing.在播了5季之后，《吸血鬼日记》终于迎来了该剧首位同性恋角色...看过《初代吸血鬼》的小伙伴们应该很熟悉他了。

According to E! Online, a new Whitmore hottie is going to be spending some quality time with Caroline after winter break ... but not in that way. Described as "handsome and sarcastic," Luke will also be joined by his sister on campus, and he'll do anything to protect her.据E!Online 网站报道，在《吸血鬼日记》冬歇回归之后，惠特莫大学里的Caroline遇到并和这个角色深交...不过不是男女之情的那种深交。这个角色帅气得来又很刻薄，和Luke一起出现的还有他的妹妹，为了保护妹妹他愿意做任何事。

While we're excited to see a gay character make his way to "The Vampire Diaries".《吸血鬼日记》会有同性恋角色的消息让我们很兴奋。
